dio_exception.connection_timeout: An error occurred due to a connection timeout.
dio_exception.send_timeout: An error occurred due to a send timeout.
dio_exception.receive_timeout: An error occurred due to a receive timeout.
dio_exception.bad_certificate: An error occurred due to an incorrect certificate.
dio_exception.bad_response: An error occurred due to an incorrect response status code.
dio_exception.cancel: An error occurred because the request was cancelled.
dio_exception.connection_error: An error occurred due to a connection error.
dio_exception.unknown: An error occurred due to an unknown reason.

weather_exception.region_error: An error occurred due to an unrecognized or invalid region being requested from the server.
weather_exception.language_error: An error occurred because the server received data in a language it doesn't support or recognize.

unknown_exception.null_response_value_error: An error occurred because the server returned an empty or null response instead of the expected data.
unknown_exception.unknown_exception: An unspecified error occurred on the server that couldn't be categorized.

client_exception.unexpected_failure_type_error: An error occurred due to unexpected failure type.
client_exception.translation_not_found_error: An error occurred due to translation not found.
client_exception.translation_update_error: An error occurred while updating the translations.
client_exception.color_not_found_error: An error occurred due to color not found.
client_exception.enum_not_found_error: An error occurred due to enum not found.
client_exception.no_internet_connection_error: An error occurred due to no internet connection.
client_exception.database_not_found_error: An error occurred due to database not found.
client_exception.file_not_found_error: An error occurred due to file not found.
client_exception.unexpected_data_type_exception: An error occurred due to unexpected data type.
client_exception.unknown_exception: An error occurred due to unknown exception.
client_exception.web_certificate_could_not_be_loaded: An error occurred while loading the web certificate.

application_text.welcome_continue_description: To begin using the Flutter Clean Architechture app, you must be a registered member.
application_text.invalid_password:
Password must be longer than 8 characters, 
contain text and number.
application_text.join_as_guest_explain: Guests can view Flutter Clean Architechture app, and read news.
application_text.empty_username: Email, phone number should not empty.
application_text.verify_description_first: We’ve sent a verification email to
application_text.verify_description_second: Kindly get OTP on the email to verify your account and log in.
application_text.verify_resend_description: Didn’t receive a link? If you’ve already checked your spam folder, you can request to resend the link here after 10 minutes.
application_text.some_error_occurred: Some error occurred, please try again!
application_text.forgot_password_content: Select how to reset your password.
application_text.not_remember_email: I don't remember my email or phone
application_text.reset_password_with_email_content: Enter the email address associated with your account and we’ll send you a link to reset your password.
application_text.forgot_password_fail: Email not exists, please try again!
application_text.forgot_password_success: Kindly check your inbox for our email and click on the link provided to reset your password.
application_text.empty_repeat_new_password: Repeat new password should not empty.
application_text.invalid_new_password:
New password must be longer than 8 characters, 
contain text and number.
application_text.invalid_repeat_new_password:
Repeat new password must be longer than 8 characters, 
contain text and number.
application_text.new_password_missing_upper_character: New password is missing capital characters.
application_text.new_password_missing_special_character: New password is missing special characters.
application_text.repeat_new_password_missing_upper_charac: Repeat new password is missing capital characters.
application_text.repeat_new_password_missing_special_char: Repeat new password is missing special characters.
application_text.password_not_match: New password does not match repeat new password.
application_text.image_size_too_big: Image size too big! Please select other image.
application_text.need_agreement: You need to agree to the Terms of use.
application_text.confirm_delete_account: Are you sure to delete your account?
application_text.deletedAccount: You have successfully deleted your account. Please log in again.
